articles.title: Why Warner could have final say on Aussie prodigy’s Test debut - Fox Sports
articles.description: It is one of the biggest burning questions heading into the first Test at Adelaide Oval and David Warner is set to play a major role in answering it.
articles.content:
Will Pucovskis rapid rise has seen the young gun brought into the Test squad and firmly into the discussion to combine with Warner for Australias opening partnership.
